alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:11PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, central Rutherford and northeastern Williamson Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking two strong thunderstorms. One storm was located over Brentwood, and another storm was located over Smyrna. Both storms were moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Nolensville, Walterhill and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 61 and 64. Interstate 24 between mile markers 60 and 84. Interstate 840 between mile markers 38 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
